document.full_text: the toll of the great recession can be counted in lost jobs and foreclosed homes, or by the large number of floridians who say they cannot afford to serve as jurors for the casey anthony murder trial.
document.title: in tough economy, more people begging off jury duty
lines_and_colors: the toll of the great recession can be counted in lost jobs and foreclosed homes, or by the large number of floridians who say they cannot afford to serve as jurors for the casey anthony murder trial.
